conclusion: Analyze the path of the liquid as it interacts with the baffles.
Liquid starts at point A and flows downward.
Liquid encounters the orange baffle, which is slanted to the right.
Liquid follows the slope of the orange baffle and is directed to the right.
Liquid continues downward and is directed by the next baffle (light blue) towards the left.
Liquid flows into container E.
Liquid starts at point B and flows downward.
Liquid encounters the orange baffle, which is slanted to the right.
Liquid follows the slope of the orange baffle and is directed to the right.
Liquid continues downward and is directed by the next baffle (light blue) towards the left.
Liquid flows into container E.
Liquid starts at point C and flows downward.
Liquid encounters the gray baffle, which is slanted to the left.
Liquid follows the slope of the gray baffle and is directed to the left.
Liquid continues downward and is directed by the next baffle (red) towards the right.
Liquid flows into container F.
Liquid starts at point D and flows downward.
Liquid encounters the blue baffle, which is slanted to the left.
Liquid follows the slope of the blue baffle and is directed to the left.
Liquid continues downward and is directed by the next baffle (red) towards the right.
Liquid flows into container G.
Liquid from A flows into container E.
Liquid from B flows into container E.
Liquid from C flows into container F.
Liquid from D flows into container G.
